inclusion.criterion: Known lung lesion(s) based on SOC non-contrast CT
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Negative urine pregnancy test in women of child-bearing potential (WCBP) within 1 week
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Undergone a non-contrast chest CT in a time frame that will accommodate experimental imaging (s-DCT) within 2 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Institutional Review Board (IRB) written informed consent obtained and signed
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: good conscience, expose a fetus to unnecessary radiation exposure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The study scan, s-DCT, will be performed within two weeks of his/her clinical evaluations by chest CT and CR.
exclusion.label: triggers
